services.name: Unity 101
services.subtitle: Unity tutoring your way!
services.short-description: Get personalized help in starting your Unity adventures! From small hobby projects to publishing your first professional game, this is the place to begin your journey!
services.description: Ready to become a confident Unity developer? From small hobby projects to publishing your first professional game, this is the place to begin your journey! Our one-on-one tutoring service is built around your goals, your pace, and your projects. We offer a personalized learning plan that covers the most essential and in-demand areas of game development.
featured-description: Unlock your potential with a personalized tutoring plan built just for you. Through one-on-one sessions, you'll master the Unity Engine fundamentals, C# scripting, and core game design principles. Whether you're just starting out or looking to sharpen your skills, each lesson is tailored to your pace and goals, ensuring steady progress and real-world understanding.

From building interactive gameplay systems to implementing smart game AI, this plan dives deep into the practical side of development. You'll learn how to structure efficient code, work with physics systems, and bring your game to life with responsive animation integration, all while following clean development practices. Hands-on testing techniques are built in every step of the way, helping you catch bugs early and improve player experience.

Scheduling is fully flexible, so you can learn on your time without the stress. And with built-in guidance on version control, you'll be equipped with professional workflows from day one. If you're looking to turn your game ideas into playable, polished experiences, this is your next step.

benefits.title: One-on-one sessions
benefits.description: Get the attention and support you deserve with personalized, one-on-one tutoring. No crowded classes, no generic videos! Just focused time with an experienced mentor who's there to answer your questions, solve your challenges, and guide your growth in real time. Every session is tailored to your goals, your pace, and your project.

benefits.title: Personalized learning plans
benefits.description: No two developers are alike, so why settle for a one-size-fits-all curriculum? We create a custom learning path built around your experience level, interests, and career goals. Whether you're building your first prototype or refining a portfolio piece, your plan evolves with you, ensuring you're always learning what matters most.

benefits.title: Flexible scheduling
benefits.description: Life gets busy. We get it. That's why we offer flexible scheduling to fit tutoring around your lifestyle, not the other way around. Whether you prefer evenings, weekends, or changing availability week to week, we'll work with you to find times that keep your momentum going without the stress.

addons.name: Provide custom project assets
addons.description: Receive custom assets tailored to your project needs.

addons.name: Provide custom recordings or documentation
addons.description: Receive custom learning materials to personalize your async learning experience.

addons.name: Develop custom features or plugins
addons.description: I will create features for you to test and expand upon in your learning process.

topics.title: Unity Fundamentals
topics.description: Get a solid foundation in Unity, one of the world's leading real-time development platforms. Whether you're new to game development or switching engines, we'll guide you through the Unity Editor, scene setup, components, and prefabs with practical, hands-on exercises. You'll gain the confidence to navigate projects, build scenes, and understand how everything fits together in a real production workflow.

topics.title: Game Design Fundamentals
topics.description: Learn the art of creating games that are not only fun but intuitive and user-friendly. We'll cover the essentials of game design theory, player feedback, onboarding, and interface layout. Whether it's designing engaging core loops or building clean, responsive menus, you'll develop the skills to make your game both playable and enjoyable from start to finish.

topics.title: Testing Fundamentals
topics.description: Become a more efficient and effective developer by mastering the tools and techniques for finding and fixing bugs fast. Learn how to use Unity's debugging tools, log analysis, and profiler, along with structured testing approaches to ensure your game is stable and polished. No more wasting time on mysterious crashes or spaghetti code issues.

topics.title: C# Scripting
topics.description: Unlock the full power of Unity with C# scripting. We'll help you go from zero to fluent in writing game logic, creating interactivity, and architecting your systems the right way. Learn core programming concepts, Unity's scripting API, and best practices that will help you code smarter, cleaner, and more efficiently. This is where your games truly come to life.

topics.title: Game AI
topics.description: Build intelligent behaviors for enemies, NPCs, and gameplay systems using Unity's AI tools. Learn pathfinding with NavMesh, decision-making through state machines, and even how to create reactive AI that challenges the player in meaningful ways. We'll tailor the AI depth to match your projectâ€”whether it's simple patrol routes or complex tactical opponents.

topics.title: Physics
topics.description: Make your world feel responsive and grounded with Unity's powerful physics system. We'll explore Rigidbody dynamics, collision detection, forces, gravity, and more. Whether you're building a fast-paced platformer or a puzzle game with precise interactions, you'll learn how to make physics work for your design, not against it.

topics.title: Animation
topics.description: Bring your game world to life with smooth, expressive motion. Whether you're working with 2D sprites or 3D rigs, you'll learn how to animate characters and objects using Unity's animation tools and Animator Controller. From simple transitions to complex animation states, we'll show you how to add energy and clarity to your game's visuals.

topics.title: Version Control
topics.description: Whether you're working alone or in a team, version control is your safety net. We'll guide you through version tracking tools and workflows that protect your project from data loss and help you manage changes over time. Learn how to stay organized, roll back mistakes, and collaborate smoothly with others, all without missing a beat.

services.name: Unreal 101
services.subtitle: Unreal tutoring your way!
services.short-description: Get personalized help in starting your Unreal Engine journey! Whether you're building a prototype or aiming to develop a polished, professional game, this is the perfect place to level up with expert guidance in both Blueprints and C++.
services.description: Unlock the full potential of Unreal Engine with one-on-one tutoring tailored to your goals. Whether you're building your first game or leveling up your professional skills, we'll guide you through Unreal's powerful systems, from level design and animation to AI and cross-platform builds. With a flexible learning plan built around your experience and interests, you'll gain confidence using both C++ and Blueprints while developing real-world, production-ready skills. Learn faster, solve real challenges, and bring your ideas to life your way.

topics.title: UE Fundamentals
topics.description: Build a strong foundation in Unreal Engineâ€”the powerhouse behind many of today's top-tier games. Learn to navigate the editor, understand levels, actors, components, and the essential systems that drive gameplay. Whether you're starting fresh or switching from another engine, we'll help you master the tools and workflows that make Unreal tick.

topics.title: Game Design Fundamentals
topics.description: Design games that are as intuitive as they are engaging. Learn how to apply core game design principles, build responsive user interfaces with UMG (Unreal Motion Graphics), and craft player experiences that feel polished and professional. From menus to HUDs to user flowsâ€”we help you design with players in mind.

topics.title: Testing Fundamentals
topics.description: Get ahead of bugs before they become blockers. Learn how to use Unreal's debugging tools like the Visual Logger, output log, breakpoints, and on-screen debugging. We'll also cover in-editor testing, play-in-editor workflows, and methods for validating systems before they go live.

topics.title: C++ and Blueprints
topics.description: Master Unreal Engine's dual powerhouses: Blueprints and C++. Learn how to build gameplay systems visually with Blueprints, then go deeper with C++ to unlock advanced functionality, custom actors, and performance-driven solutions. We'll show you how these two systems work together so you can create clean, scalable, and flexible game logic with confidence. Whether you're aiming for rapid prototyping or full-scale development, this balanced approach gives you the best of both worlds.

topics.title: Game AI
topics.description: Build smarter, more reactive NPCs with Unreal's AI systems. You'll explore Behavior Trees, Blackboards, EQS (Environment Query System), and AI Controllers to craft intelligent enemies, companions, or ambient AI. Whether you need a basic guard patrol or a tactical enemy, we'll teach you how to bring it to life.

topics.title: Physics
topics.description: Create more immersive gameplay with Unreal's physics simulation. Learn how to use physics bodies, collision channels, constraints, and force applications. From destructible environments to realistic movement, we'll help you understand and control how your game world behaves under the laws of physics.

topics.title: Animation
topics.description: Bring your characters and creatures to life with powerful animation tools in Unreal. Explore animation blueprints, blend spaces, state machines, and control rigs to create fluid and responsive motion. Whether it's a walk cycle or complex combat animations, you'll learn how to tie animation into gameplay for dynamic results.

topics.title: Version Control
topics.description: Whether you're working alone or in a team, version control is your safety net. We'll guide you through version tracking tools and workflows that protect your project from data loss and help you manage changes over time. Learn how to stay organized, roll back mistakes, and collaborate smoothly with others, all without missing a beat.

pricing-offers.title: 100% Upfront Payment
pricing-offers.description: Pay in full up-front and unlock unbeatable value! Not only do you **save 10%**, but you'll also receive a **fully customized sandbox project (a $1,000 value) included absolutely free** with your learning plan. Jumpstart your journey with the ultimate personalized experience, designed to help you succeed faster and smarter!

pricing-offers.title: Flexible 2-Part Payment Plan
pricing-offers.description: Split your payment into two easy installments (half now, half later) and enjoy a **10% discount**! Get started right away with less upfront cost, while unlocking all the benefits of our personalized tutoring plan.

pricing-offers.title: $100 Introductory Sessions Offer
pricing-offers.description: Not sure if we're the right fit? Try your first two sessions for just **$100**! If you decide to continue within a month, that $100 goes straight toward your full learning plan, so you get a risk-free head start on your game development journey.

pricing-offers.title: Pay As You Go
pricing-offers.description: Prefer maximum flexibility? With our Pay As You Go option, you can book sessions one at a time for just $100 each with no upfront commitment required. Enjoy expert guidance at your own pace, whenever you're ready to learn!

addons.title: Sandbox Project
addons.description: Unlock your full learning potential with an exclusive Sandbox Project! This hands-on, fully customized project is designed to reinforce and expand on the concepts covered in your sessions directly inside the engine. Dive in, experiment, and master new skills faster with a practical, interactive environment built just for you. It's the ultimate way to turn knowledge into real-world results!

addons.title: Practice Sessions (1 session)
addons.description: Supercharge your progress with an exclusive practice session! After completing your learning plan, book an extra session within 1 month to reinforce key concepts, tackle lingering questions, or polish your skills with expert guidance. It's the perfect way to lock in your knowledge and keep your momentum going strong!

addons.title: Practice Sessions (3 sessions)
addons.description: Strengthen your understanding of the topics covered in your learning plan with a bundle of three focused practice sessions. After completing your plan, schedule these sessions within 1 month to review and reinforce key concepts, clarify any lingering questions, and ensure you have a solid grasp of the material. It's an effective way to build confidence and retain what you've learned.
